name: The Housewife (itch)
description:
Donna Satorelli was a housewife.

Donna had been taking her Sunday afternoon tea, when a trio of assassins burst into the parlor.

You are an employee of the Department of Eternal and Thereafter Hospitality (D.E.a.T.H.).

You have been charged with Donna Satorelli’s request to return to life and prevent her own murder.

(This game is in development. If you have questions, suggestions, or would like to contribute, please comment below or email qiadux@gmail.com.)
